name: @zabaca/mermaid-validate
description: Lightweight Mermaid diagram syntax validator using the official mermaid parser

scripts.build: bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target bun --packages external
scripts.release:patch: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version patch && bun publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version minor && bun publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: bun run check && bun test && bun pm version major && bun publish && git push && git push --tags

author: Zabaca
